CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 2, 1955, pg. 10 reads: "Mr. and Mrs. James N. Brown...in pretty wedding" Portion of accompanying article reads: "Pelmon-Brown Wedding Is Event of Early Spring - The marriage of Miss Nellie Pelmon, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Frank Pelmon and James N. Brown, son of Mrs. Edna Brown, Pittsburgh, and E. Nathaniel Brown, Washington, D.C., was performed March 19 at the Community Baptist Church..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Pelmon - Brown wedding party with six men, including Chester Driesbach, Ernest Perkins, Richelieu Davis, Lathia Gaddie, Howard Mills, and groom James N. Brown, in center, and six women, including Rozena Pelmon, Beulah DeVaughn, Mary Young, Alma Frazier, Geraldine Baker, and bride Nellie Pelmon Brown wearing gown with tulle skirt and sheer long sleeved floral overlay, mid-length veil with small head piece, and eyeglasses, posed in Community Baptist Church, another version
